name: charlene allen
text: Employees are extremely nice and helpful! Dr. Campbell-awesome, easy to talk to and listened to all my concerns! The young guy that helped me pick out my frames had excellent taste and was fun to shop with! My glasses were ready super fast! Will definately recommend to my friends!

name: Jessica
text: I’ve been coming here for years and it’s always been great. Today’s visit though was one of the best I’ve ever experience! The staff was super friendly, and I’ve never had an exam done in such a timely manner before! Keep being amazing!

name: Carson Blankenship
text: I have been a patient here for years & have had nothing but wonderful and satisfactory experiences. I just ordered contacts over the phone because I live In a new city, and Ms. Terrish went ABOVE AND BEYOND to help me. She was funny, professional, & kind. I cannot give this employee or this business enough praise! Thank you so much!

name: Brittnee Serda
text: I brought my daughter in this morning for a eye app. It was her 2nd one and Marcus the guy who checked us in and walked us to the room made sure to make my daughter feel comfortable and calm her nerves. I really appreciate the service. Thank you so much for being friendly and sweet. ❤️ Will definitely go back.

name: FUU CHAN
text:
They checked my eyesight very carefully and examined me. Also, when I chose eyeglasses, I had a lot of choices and it was a good opportunity. It is highly recommended to adjust the glasses here.

You need to make a reservation by phone.

name: alfred keely
text: When we made the appointment for the eye exam, we were told that we didn't have to get our glasses from them. I have used the eye doctor there in the past, and was happy with the quality of the exam. I went there today for my appointment,  and the doctor side was excellent. Then I was escorted to the eyeglass side. When I told them I wasn't getting glasses today, and asked for my PD, they refused to give me that information. Then she said something really brilliant. That that measurement is only for their lab, and it varies from one lab to another. REALLY!  The distance from center to center of my pupils is the same wherever it gets measured. My wife is seriously ill, and a  $500.00 pair of glasses isn't possible. She was rude. I'll never go back.

name: Jaelene Rivera
text: Been there for almost 3 or 4 years and still worth to come here. Fantastic customer service and Friendly staff. I love to come here and I love my glasses so much!

name: Linda Martinez
text: Ashley was the most helpful and kind associate ever.  Quick service with a smile!  Highly recommend

name: Carey Frasier
text: Love this place.... so so helpful. lots of style and smile..

name: Stacy Wilborn
text:
I have purchased regular glasses, prescription sunglasses, safety glasses, and my four year old step son's glasses from Marx Optical. Every time I have come to Marx Optical, I have had a perfect experience! They have always been so helpful in answering all of my questions. Kathy has been there on every visit of mine. She is always so good to us, and completely on top of her game. I've noticed her assisting others, multitasking and always prompt, and with a great attitude. I have had Sabrina assist me, she is so helpful and not only brightened my day, but seemed to do the same with everyone else she encountered. And when I brought my step son to get his glasses, I had the assistant of Lindsey and she was so patient and great with him. He has a more complicated prescription and she showed us more options for frames that won't break as easily (considering he's four and full of energy)

I highly recommend Marx Optical! They're quick and will treat you right!

name: Ryan Day
text: I was in Decatur for a weekend in January for a family funeral, coming from out of town, and I stupidly forgot both my glasses and extra daily contacts.  Marx Optical was kind enough to provide me with two days' worth of trial daily contacts at no charge to help me out.  I would highly recommend.  Very nice people.

name: Ulonda Barker
text: My experience with this business have been a terrible one,  after purchasing lens for my glasses on 9/19/2019. On 8/11/2020 used curbside service for glasses last repaired for only tighting frame and prior service for exact same routine service from date of purchase. I returned on 8/21/2020 to curbside service based on one leg cracked, due to frame was tighten to tight to end up with a cracked len. In discussing issue with Service Tech,  I was told to replace len would cost me $125 and their would be nothing else Marx Optical could do. I consider my service that was rendered is a rip off based on less than a year from 9/19/2019 intial purchase and finding  my len cracked in my glass case as I put glasses onto my face for breakfast and service rendered for glasses tighted on 8/11/2020. Personally doing business with inconsiderate respect for it's customers.  Is very disgraceful.

name: Mark Thomason
text: Dr. B does an amazing job of dialing in my prescription. I have tried several other places over the years (we moved) but now I travel back to Decatur to see Dr. B every year. The glasses I got from other places were a waste of money. I ended up coming back to Marx and had them install new lens in my old frames. I will never trust anyone with my eyesight other than Dr. B again.

name: John Kearse
text: I LOVED MY EXPERIENCE WITH THE GREAT WOMEN AT MARX OPTICAL. FROM THE RECEPTIONISTS, TO MY LOVELY DOCTOR, DOWN TO THE ASSISTANTS AND REPRESENTATIVES HANDLING THE FITTINGS. I FELT LIKE FAMILY, NOT ANOTHER CUSTOMER AND WOULD RECOMMEND ANYONE GOING THERE TO GET GREAT STYLISH GLASSES AND TO FEEL LIKE HOME WITH TONS OF SMILES & LOVE AS WELL!!! I ALSO LOVED MY FITTING WITH MS. KRISTINA H. SHE WAS WONDERFUL!!!

name: Tonja Crisler
text: Recently had an appointment and even though they were in the middle of construction I don't have 1 complaint! It was totally the opposite, they were extremely nice and helpful. The staff went over and beyond for me  I give them 5 full stars. 😊

name: Will Wright
text: I have bought glasses from Kathy before, but it is always a pleasure to deal with her at the front desk. I had Sandy wait on me this time and she was very nice,  pleasant and professional to work with. Gail came over and assisted and it was all a pleasure. I’m always appreciative of the service I have got, and this year was no different.

name: Vann Morrow
text: Have always gotten courteous , professional service every time I have been here . Even today with the curbside service for just a frame repair , in the rain, everyone was absolutely great !

name: monwitt
text: Pam and Sabrina did a great job helping me pick out my frames. I felt like family right when they started working with me. I would definitely recommend my friends and family to go see these awesome professionals. Wonderful customer service is greatly appreciated!!!

name: Jeannabeanna Stephens
text: Dr. Brock was wonderful! All the people there are super nice and service is quick. Prices are very reasonable. I will be using them from now on.

name: christopher odell
text: Awsome place prices up there but the people did a great and look good to

name: Pamela W Radford
text: The last three times that I have had to get glasses a wonderful young woman named, Sabrina, has helped me and she is a fantastic person!!!!!  Not only was Sabrina so gosh dang funny she was extremely helpful in helping me choose the right glasses for me.  I vote for Sabrina to get a raise 😁.  Now I am truly promoting Sabrina here but make no mistake.....every person at Marx Optical has been a pleasure to deal with.  I have been going to Marx Optical for the past 7/8 years and I have never had a bad experience. The people are truly great!  Thank you, Pamela W Radford

name: April Bendall Woods
text: LaRhonda is the sweetest, nicest and most helpful employee there. She always goes above and beyond to help and she’s very knowledgeable about their services and glasses/contacts. Marx Optical is lucky to have such a great employee.

name: Local 360
text: Wow! Great service! I came in 30 minutes from closing with a broken arm on my VA issued glasses. The staff took them to the back & they were able to repair the glasses and didn't charge me! How great is that for on the spot service! I can see again!

name: Theduis Booth
text:
I had a great experience today in Marx optical, in Decatur. Every one was so nice, and polite.
I must give a special thanks to Ja, she literally took her to help me pick out frames. She never rushed me. Thank you Ja so much for sticking with me.

name: Mackenzie Thrasher
text: This first time glasses wearer is HAPPY! Sabrina and Pam were so helpful and awesome to work with! A love working with a good honest sales team that doesn’t push for the most expensive merchandise! My visit was effortless!

name: Brandon McNutt
text: I visited here for a routine visit. I was helped by one Miss Sabrina who was absolutely fabulous! She took care of me from start to finish and made sure I felt like family the whole time! She was easy to talk to and made me feel comfortable! I would highly recommend this place and I am so thankful for having such a wonderful person like Sabrina that helped me through it all! Not to mention that Dr. Harris was extremely professional and helpful during his evaluation! With the help of Miss Kelly I was able to get an awwsome brand new pair of glasses. I would recommend this place for all your eye Care needs!!

name: Brooke cummings
text: Sabrina was extremely helpful. She was truthful and honest and patient when I tried on every pair and was even nicer when I came to each age because the first pair I bought I didn't love. She's the best! As long as she is there I will always come back.

name: Cyndi Ludwick
text: If you want EXCELLENT customer service, see Sabrina!! She helped me with my glasses today and she is by far the sweetest associate I have EVER met!!! She was honest on what looked good..(and didn’t) on me and was also conscious of my pocketbook!!! I think Marx Optical needs to give her a raise!!!

name: Jo-Amrah Dillingham
text: Lindsey Albright was amazing to work with today. Professional, friendly. No doubt she knew what she was doing. I really appreciated the way she was able to fix my glasses which had been frustrating me for some time. Top quality service. I will return!

name: Faith Rose
text: My experience was amazing. The whole team treated me like family. The really sweet one that helped me her name was Mrs. Sabrina she was so helpful and she really found me a pair of glasses the fit my face very well and that were very nice.😊😊😊😊

name: Rhonda Stoner
text: I cannot say enough fabulous things about this place! The exam staff is efficient and kind. The optical department rocks! All of them! Sabrina helped us today. She is a love! Leidy was in training and she is going to be top-notch as well! It was great to see Miss Linda who has been around for a while and is always a sweetheart. I did not mention everyone by name, but they the staff is wonderful.

name: Ashlea Osborn
text: Kristina H was OUTSTANDING !! She helped us save a whole bunch of money and made our decision better. We was more satisfied with her help then we was when we was looking and we getting help from another lady. She helped us save almost three hundred dollars that we really did not have to spend . We was so stressed about finding some and paying for it but she helped a whole lot. She definitely needs to be recognized !!!!! She explained everything and told us all of our opinions!!

name: Truck Driver
text: 2nd visit in 2 years. I walked in, was given a paper to fill out,.wven though I told them nothing had changed.  Once I finished with completing the paperwork I was taken into a to and again went through the process of putting the info into the computer.  What good is being redundant with this. Also, prior to visit, I was bombarded with text messages on if I planned to make the appointment on time. Place is pathetic!

resp.text:
We are sincerely disappointed your experience with us was not great. Rest assured, your experience and feedback is appreciated in our pursuit of continuously improving the ability to serve.

You are correct, we do currently include up to two reminders prior to visitation, depending on how far in advance you have scheduled. However, this is certainly a feature you can opt-out from as we respect the differing opinions our patients may have with regards to reminders.

Regarding the paperwork and entry into the computer, this is definitely a point at which we are actively looking to streamline, importantly, without sacrificing vital information our Doctors require to provide a high standard of care.

We certainly realize this will not correct your experience, but we genuinely hope you understand our intention is to take your feedback and work harder for all future experiences.

Thank you,
MARX OPTICAL

name: Teiana Walker
text: I had a great experience at Marx Optical from the eye exam to picking out my frames Gail and Joshua were absolutely amazing making sure I looked my best in my glasses. And Kelly was exceptional with the fitting of my glasses. Best place in town to get your eyes checked out. I will also share this on my Facebook because I am a satisfied customer of Marx Optical!!!

name: Vashta Nerada
text: I have never had the pleasure of being helped so efficiently before today’s visit. Terrish was being trained by Sabrina today and they were wonderful, knowledgeable, and so friendly. They made this visit a 5-star event.

name: David Watson
text: Sabrina made my experience at Marx absolutely wonderful.  I was ready to order my glasses on-line because they were much cheaper than the price she originally quoted.  Sabrina told me to hold on a second and let her discuss my reluctance with her superiors.  She came back with a price considerably lower than the online price. I will be requesting Sabrina next year, and hopefully many years to come

name: Ala Bama
text: I visited Marx Optical in Decatur and overheard an employee out front refer to customers as “Love” and she was constantly popping her gum. This drove me crazy listening to it while I waited. I can’t imagine being her coworker and having to listen to the gum popping all day and as a customer, don’t call me “Love.” So unprofessional!!!

name: Tristan Smith
text: Sabrina greeted us with a big ole’ smile right when we walked in. The atmosphere was great and everyone was very welcoming. Got to checkout and it went very smoothly and with Sabrina seeing us off! Great staff!

name: Nathaniel Snow
text: My company sent me to Marx Optical to get my glasses. When I walked I asked the receptionist do my company cover my glasses expense. The other receptionist name Sabrina said what. Like had me in really doubt that my company didn’t do that, but she was only kidding around with me. Then she was sent to help me pick out my glasses. She was really helpful with me to pick out the glasses I would be really satisfied with.  Thanks Sabrina

name: Elfa Arocho
text: We love Sabrina Gibson! She is one of the sweetest most helpful person among your staff! Thanks Marx Optical for a friendly, helpful staff, and competitive prices!

name: Wendy McCulloch
text: I was a walk-in they got me right in for a eye exam and glasses.  I was shocked as to how well the workers worked together and how much they did to have everything ready for the doctor to do the exam. I went to the other side to get a pair of glasses. I had the pleasure of meeting Sabrina she was super nice and very helpful. Sabrina made the experience fun.

name: Janet Wilkinson
text:
10-30-18-Kristina was a very helpful person & she was very easy to work with in giving her expertise knowledge on getting my lens for my glasses. Love working with people who are knowledgeable & pleasant to work. Linda was able to adjust my glasses so they fit. Her knowledge & willingness to work with my older frames was excellent!
Thank you both.

name: Faye Spivey
text:
I usually deal with Marsha when I visit Marx.
She is always so kind and helpful! Her personality is contagious! She is just super!! She knows what I like when it come to frames for my face shape and always picks the ones she knows I will like.
The staff here does a great job!!

name: April Thompson
text: My Husband is a patient of Marx Optical and I accompanied him at his visit. I was so impressed with the staff as well as the warm, inviting and professional setting, I decided to setup one for myself. My appointment was with the kind, humble and calm speaking Dr. Graham. From the moment I entered the office, I never once felt like just a "Patient" The caring environment and effortlessly prompt service made me feel as if I were being taken care of by FAMILY. And oh my goodness the charismatic and professional 3 ladies by the names of Sabrina, Leidy  and (one other sweet lady who said such uplifting and kind words to me whose name I apologetically forgot 😔❤) are 3 of many reason I'd strongly suggest you go visit the Marx Optical family! I promise.. You won't be disappointed. 😀😀😀

name: Kearstin Wright
text: Sabrina Gibson was amazing! She asked what kind I liked and ran with it. When I found the glasses I liked she went the extra mile to order them in a different color so they would be perfect!

name: Rebecca Bray
text: Sabrina is your woman y'all. Amazing job with helping me find what suited my face. The doctor was excellent as well!

name: rolando mcclain
text: By far the best experience I’ve ever had getting an eye exam. Sabrina Gibson did an awesome job assisting us today. We were in and out in a very timely manner. We will definitely be back.

name: Sandy Ray
text: Had a wonderful experience today!  Sabrina helped me find the perfect pair of glasses and she was amazing.  Very knowledgeable and willing to assist me in finding the glasses that will best suit my unique needs.  Thank you!

name: Hondahaney
text: way way overpriced....

name: Tara W
text: Sabrina was so helpful and made the process of getting glasses for my mom with her new prescription a breeze!! She really listened to what we needed and has a great personality, which is a huge plus!! Thanks so much!

name: Angela Melson
text: Sabrina was a WONDERFUL help with my glasses I came in with frames and she helped me find new and better ones. TOTALLY SATISFIED with her customer service! Thank you so much!

name: Dylan Reiser
text: Sabrina and Gage were awesome! Helped me pick out frames and lenses in my budget! 10/10 recommend.

name: BreAnna Elliott
text: Sabrina and Dr. B are amazing! I enjoy the whole staff! Fast, friendly, and efficient

name: Cameron Oliver
text: The customer service was amazing. Ms. Sabrina teaching Josh very well. He did a really good job. He has a bright future in the company.

name: Shelby Terry
text: My first time at Marx Optical was awesome thanks to Dr. B, Sabrina, and Sandy! They helped me pick out my glasses no problem and informed me how much my insurance would cover, and told me HONESTLY which glasses looked good and bad and I am super thankful for that lol! I enjoyed the customer service very friendly and compassionate :)

name: Ryan Dunlap
text: I was helped by a lady named Marsha and she was absolutely amazing. We had a rough day involving a trip to the emergency room and once we got to Marx it was like a breath of fresh air to be helped by someone who genuinely cared. She was super patient and never once made us feel like a problem. She was amazing! I would recommend Marx Optical to anyone! And don’t forget to ask for Marsha I promise you won’t regret it!

name: Kathryn Brannon
text: Love Marx Optical!! Everyone was so nice even when my insurance was a huge mess. Love going here to find new glasses! Kristina Hyatt was the best! Love her & my new glasses.

name: Alexis Almazan
text: Sabrina was of excellent help, took her time to explain the whole process, fast and attentive service! Really enjoyed my experience! Everyone was very friendly and helping.

name: Merita Sharp
text: Saturday, 2/22/19, was my first visit to Marx Optical in Decatur.  I did not have an appointment but was immediately met by Kathy who instantly put me at ease and provided outstanding service.  Kathy's knowledge and professionalism will make me a long term customer.

name: Jaime Corcoran
text: Great experience!! Helpful and friendly staff. Sabrina was excellent!! She explained everything in terms we could understand and took her time with us. I would recommend Marx optical, and Sabrina to everyone!!!

name: Teri Wilhelm
text: Today Ms. Kristina helped me out and was amazing.  She made it a very simple process for me. The ladies here are wonderful. I have not ever had a bad experience and have gotten several pair of glasses here over the years.

name: Cindy Brantley
text: I have to give a huge shout out for Marsha!!  She was so very kind, helpful and certainly to much fun!!   She's the best and Marx Optical is truly a better place with her a part of their team!!!!!!

name: Shaquille Moore
text: I really enjoyed my experience there. I scheduled my appointment a week early and the lady who assisted me Sabrina made sure I had all my information in the system ahead of time so I didn’t have to worry when I arrived the following week. Terrish another associate also was very helpful with finding me the perfect pair of glasses. The staff members are all amazing. I’m an observant person and I notice how everything ran smoothly even with them going through a renovation. I would recommend anyone to visit the Decatur location on Beltline road if they’re in need of an eye exam or simply getting your glasses readjusted. My service was swift and I also received my prescription glasses the same day in less than an hour after my exam which was amazing!  I’m looking forward to my next checkup in a year to see my progress and also to visit the friendly staff.

name: Roger Simpson
text: Sabrina took very good care of me. Made sure I got the contacts I needed and took care of updating my glasses. All with a smiling face and a professional attitude!

name: Christy Moore
text: Sabrina was very professional and helpful! Love the pleasant atmosphere of this place! Got some great glasses with the help of Ms. Sabrina! Thank you!

name: Sharon Kreps
text: Cheyenne and Sabrina were AWESOME! This was my first visit to Marx Optical and I will definitely be back. Thanks guys!

name: Shannan Kitchens
text: Great experience today! Dr. Harris always does a great job and explains everything. Sabrina was great in helping me order my contacts! They will be shipped straight to my house! She even helped me get a rebate!

name: LaTasha Hurth
text: Marx Optical, is a great friendly eye institute. I was welcomed by Nicki with a warm good morning.  I was pleased, they were very prompt with time.  Everyone  was very professional. Sabrina and Terrish  made sure  I was please with my glasses and my visit at Marx Optical.

name: Bobbie Burleigh
text: Sabrina did an awesome job helping me choose new glasses. She was very patient and informative I highly recommend.

name: Daniel Brackin
text: Excellent!!!!! Sabrina Gibson took GREAT care of me when I went to get new glasses. I didn’t know my insurance provider and she quickly helped me get situated. Thanks Marx Optical for being so AWESOME!!!!! War eagle!

name: Michelle Buttgereit
text: Sabrina is amazing! Felt like I had a family member by my side through the entire process. So many options and decisions to make and I never felt pressured to rush or pushed into extras. Loyal customer for life.

name: Misty Cartee
text: I would like to thank Amy and Melinda for helping my Dad. He had an accident in December where he scratched and warped his glasses. These ladies helped me replace them with no problem. I picked him out a new pair by using his old prescription. He was so thankful when we delivered them to him in the Shepherd Center in Atlanta. Thank you for your time and for the caring you showed during our situation.

name: Brooke Nelson
text: I love this place & their staff. They are wonderful & friendly & get you in & out in a timely manor. I have visited 3 times so far and never had an issue. I would recommend to anyone.

name: Emily Doner
text: I was a walk in and from doctor side to glasses it was a wonderful experience. Alex and Sabrina were patient and kind helping me pick out my frames. I love Marx optical

name: Tanya Kirby
text: Dr. Kevin Harris is the best.  Sabrina was amazing.   She helped me find new glasses and was just great to work with😁

name: Katy Parker
text: Very open floor plan with a wide range of styles for glasses. Staff can be a bit condescending whereas the actual optometrist se wonderful. I do usually feel rushed as if they can’t wait to process me out and get me out of tge store quickly. Pros and cons come up with any business, this just isn’ty preferred environment.

name: Megan Kendrick
text: Sabrina is absolutely amazing! Great experience with the entire staff. I will definitely be returning for all of my eye needs.

name: Loren Bray
text: Sabrina is awesome! She made sure my daughter had the best fit, and we thoroughly enjoyed visiting with her!

name: Jacqueline Lee
text: I had the pleasure of have 3 AMAZING ladies on assisting me in picking out the perfect pair of glasses for me they were fun pleasant and honest to what fit my features and personality.  They made sure I was happy with my choice and didn't push anything on me I didn't want. So I thank Kristina,Sabrina and Laidy those ladies were fantastic!!!

name: Jakepatty69
text: I was in quite the bind after my pup had a go at my glasses this morning, in need of glasses so I could work (I drive a truck for a living) I came to Marx Optical in hopes that someone would be able to help me! Thankfully I was lucky enough to get paired up with Ms Sabrina! She was so helpful and had such a professional aproach to my problems! I could genuinely tell that she cared, I will definitely recommend Marx Optical to anyone in the future!!

name: Austin Craft
text: Markus was wonderful. Sabrina, Kathy, and Belinda also took great care of me and made me feel at home. I appreciate what y’all do!

name: Melanie Harrison
text: Sabrina was such help! I highly recommend!! She was so helpful!

name: Cramer Oliver
text: Ms. Sabrina did such a wonderful job. She was training joshua and he was very cooperative. Plus he did very good work being new and has a bright future. They both a fantastic job.

name: Jades Life story’s
text: Marx optical was great. I wasn’t going to buy a frame but Sabrina was so helpful with finding the right fit I couldn’t resist getting the frame. Thanks Sabrina for your wonderful service.

name: Self Defense AZ
text: I was about to walk out from Marx Optical in Decatur AL, when Sabrina and Janet helped me find everything I needed. They were superstars and deserve five stars. Thank you Sabrina and Janet.

name: Margarita Ayala
text: I always go to this place for my contacts and glasses. Great customer service and reasonable prices. Sabrina’s the best!! Go Navy!

name: Alec Uptain
text: Sabrina was awesome today! Got in and out, helped me pick exactly what glasses I wanted. Very satisfied customer.

name: Bethann Tripp
text: The team at Marx Optical were all amazing! Sabrina helped with my glasses and corrie on the nursing staff were both absolutely wonderful! Overall had a great experience with everyone here!

name: Jerrica Pettus
text: So today I had my very first eye appointment and Sabrina and Leidy took very good care of me they met all my needs plus more. These ladies did an awesome job they were quick and very professional.

name: Chrissy Williams
text: I had a great time picking out my glasses with Sabrina. She was very helpful when choosing the right pair to fit my face. Thanks !!

name: Karla L.
text: Sabrina was a great help! I love that they offer a large selection of frames. I’ll continue to do business here. Definitely recommend.

name: Matt Miller
text: Sabrina and Trina hooked me up with a great pair of glasses and new contacts today!! Thank you both, and thank you Marx Optical for having such a kind and helpful staff!

name: Steven Heinlein
text: Sabrina did an awesome job, she makes customer service a top priority! Definitely the place if you want service & value.

name: Donae Richmond
text: Shout out to Sabrina and the team for exceeding our expectations! Great service! Awesome prices...

name: Rachel Hale
text: I've used this company for 17 years. The staff and my eye doctor, Dr. B, have become more like family. They always ask how I am and check on my family. I've never been mistreated and they've always been very helpful. When I got pink eye, I had went to my family doctor first and it wasn't clearing up. I decided to visit my eye doctor and they got me an appointment quickly, explained why I wasn't getting well and had me back out the door with prescriptions. (I'll add that my family doctor wasn't at fault) The only thing that has changed over the years is that they've grown. My wait is a little longer due to this but it's not extreme. For great service, I choose to stay.

name: Summer Lee
text: sabrina took care of me today, could not have gotten a better one! sweetest lady!

name: Jonathan Mangino
text: Always leave Marx Optical having received great service! Wouldn’t go anywhere else! Sabrina recently helped my son with his new glasses and was so nice and he really enjoyed her great personality!

name: Amber Harris
text: I purchased some glasses yesterday and I was not happy with the frames. I returned my glasses and a woman named Sabrina helped me choose a new frames that I loved!! Morever the Marx Optical team helped refit my new perscription lenses to my old frames. The Marx Optical team are very professional, cordial, and kind. They want to make sure their customers are satisfied with their purchases and care. I highly recommend them for your eye care needs.

name: maryla sears
text: Nikki at Marx Optical was awesome today I came in with an eye allergic reaction to eye medication , my vision was blurry she took over from there after she recognized my situation she filled out my paperwork and also got me a pair of sensitive to light shades , she was an awesome receptionist , not only Nikki took good care of me everyone that I had to see before I got to see Leslie Graham O.D. made sure that I got the best treatment   !! Great team at Marx Optical

name: Chasity Lee
text: Sabrina and Allen were absolutely amazing!!!! The customer service was great. I will definitely be back.

name: April Elliott
text: My visit at Marx today was absolutely amazing!!!! I was one of the last people and Sabrina did not rush me and made me feel so comfortable at my choices!!! I will definitely be back!!

name: kenya danielle
text: Sabrina Gibson gave my family and I a wonderful experience! Will definitely be returning. Thank you Ms.Gibson ❤️

name: Emily Wilson
text: The girls here are great and very helpful! I always have a great experience. Sabrina is the best!!

name: Cheryl Standridge
text: The staff was so helpful and friendly. Sabrina did an awesome job helping me choose my new glasses.

name: Jennifer Newberger
text:
I've been coming here since I was 13 years old, I've never had any problems or bad experience. They are good people and always make me feel welcome and comfortable.

.

name: Alma Willingham
text: Kristi and Mrs. Linda were absolutely WONDERFUL!!! They took care of my kids. We were visiting from out of town and they needed glasses. Kristi and Mrs. Linda made us feel extra SPECIAL!!!

name: LG LG
text: I had a wonderful experience at Marx Optical. Sabrina was very friendly and personable. She and Cathy worked together to give  me great service.

name: Talia Ray
text: We love this place! You can't beat getting a through exam and glasses the same day! Mrs. Linda and Mrs. Sabrina were very helpful!  We will be back!

name: Faith Whisman
text: Sabrina was a really good help with everything. I love Marx’s optical when it comes to getting my eyes checked they always do so good ! Thank you guys .

name: RedGrizzlyGaming
text: Sabrina, best experience ever, best sales rep I ever have seen in the business. Need he at Cintas.

name: jackie mcallen
text: Have gone in twice, when I slept w/glasses and popped lens out, twice too adjust cuz ppl w/bigger heads put my glasses on and today because someone knocked then off counter and they got stepped on and so mangled. They saved them in minutes!! I love this place!!

name: Gina Kelley
text: Alex was very helpful finding the correct frames for me and made sure I was happy with the choice. She actually took the time to make you feel important.

name: Glenn Mcmahan
text: Larhonda who fitted my glasses and the staff are very professional.  Thanks Love the glasses.

name: Pat Underwood
text: Have been a consumer since my first pair of glasses in 4th grade. Best place in town. A quality experience & with friendly staff. Ask for Josh McCarley, he did a great job setting me up with my new frames.

name: rose jackson
text:
This company comes highly recommended; I give them 5 stars for excellent customer service, and this is why; I had concerns related to the fit of my new glasses, which I elected to purchase elsewhere, but a dedicated employee of theirs, LaRhonda, went above and beyond to assist me with modifications to glasses I purchased elsewhere, all while maintaining a friendly smile.  She also made me aware that if I can't decide upon a particular frame they have in Stock, they can always special order for me, the frames I desire to have.
Thank-you LaRhonda for exceptional customer service!!!

text: Went got my eye exam and glasses same day didn't have to wait long at all, had an appointment. Everyone was really nice and friendly, Sabrina helped me picking out frames and went over my lenses options with me was very helpful. Will be back in the future for my eyecare needs. :)

text: The service is excellent!! Markus was so professional and had all the answers to my questions!! And Sabrina- loved her so friendly and made me feel so at home!!Never had a problem coming to Marx Optical!!!

name: Racheal Harris
text: Cheyenne was very helpful she showed me many options for glasses all exactly my style her trainer Sabrina was also really great she was very patient and showed me many options.

name: Jonathan D. Wynn
text:
Have been using them for several years now.  Staff and Dr. Harris are always nice and professional.  I don't have vision insurance, but price on visit is always reasonable.  Wait time is a little long but I never make an appointment either.  I'm always a "walk-in".  The eyeware part is a bit higher on retail prices for contacts so I choose to buy my contacts online.  They are always nice and helpful in providing my written Rx to purchase my contacts elsewhere.  Overall, I would recommend Dr. Harris @ Marx Optical to anyone looking for a good optometrist.......

Update : I have officially quit seeing them after  10+ years.  After sitting waiting for almost 3hours with an eye injury,  I felt as though greater concern should have been given to at least administer a triage type exam to assess the situation,  but none was given.  In much pain,  I decided to leave after nearly 3 hours of waiting, since no concern was given.  I don't know if  my doctor knew that an eye injury was waiting,  but if not, his office staff have been poorly trained to deal with medical necessity Vs.  Standard eye exams.  I have seeked out an ophthalmologist and will begin seeing Dr Cain from now on instead of any optometrist office.

name: Madeline Letson
text: Sabrina was fantastic and I think she should get commission for her sales! Such a great experience!!!

name: Kelli Starnes

They did my glasses wrong finally had to get another pair and out of all the money I had already paid them  they still wanted me to pay the difference. When you tell them about your problem and you want something done about it, everyone of the workers  treat you like you need to be watched when you go in  Will not ever go back!! Even my insurance company told me that I should have requested my Rx and went somewhere else.

name: Tom Polk
text: It was time for an eye exam and I recall using Marx Optical/Decatur Eye Institute a few years back so decided to make an appointment. I work the same hours they are open so time off from work was needed. They are open Saturdays but for the next few weekends, the Saturday hours were not late enough. The preliminary exam area was crowded with other patients, I could hear others replies to medical questions and I'm sure they could hear mine. So much for medical information privacy. I had to ask twice to get a print out of my prescription. I do not recommend.

text: Avoid. Just....avoid

name: Susie :D
text: Good

name: Nicole Hurd
text: My experience at BarKing Optical far surpassed my highest expectations. Not only was the doctor personable, informative and pleasant to talk to; she was also extremely thorough and prides herself in educating her patients. Additionally, the staff was charming, courteous and cordial. What a great team they all are.  Based on my profession I’ve noticed that due to the pandemic some businesses now struggle with keeping up their customer service levels due to staffing shortages. But trust me, you won’t find that an issue here. If I could give the doctor and her team higher than 5-stars I would. And the office is quaint and cozy tucked away inside beautiful downtown Mobile, AL. It’s worth the drive no matter where you live along the Gulf Coast & I’m a tough critic!

name: Suely CM
text: Top notch service from Dr. King, Becky & Teresa. They’re really nice & take the time to make sure that you are happy with your new lenses. It’s always a pleasure to talk to Ms. Becky regarding any issues and she’ll always tell you to drop in should you need an adjustment to your glasses.

name: Dean Waite
text: Stop going to Walmart and other chain optometrists.  Support your local businesses.   Dr. King and her team- Becky and Teresa- are, hands down, the best in town.  Unbelievably friendly with top-notch service.  Dr. King is very thorough and takes the time to really provide an excellent eye exam.  They have state-of-the-art equipment and a very nice, welcoming office. Great sunglass selection too.   This should be the only optometrist you consider in town- wouldn’t go anywhere else!

name: Melody Bagwell
text: Excellent care. I have only needed glasses in the past few years. FINALLY, I have the correct prescription and i can see! It's great to be able to see again and pick up the crafts I love so much.

name: Terri Legg El-Farkh
text: Dr. King made my anxious daughter feel right at home. The office is cozy, there is a good selection of frames, and she and Mrs. Lyons took time with us to make sure everything went smoothly.  My daughter got a great pair of stylish glasses and can see clearly for the first time. Thanks so much!

name: Ron Marcelino
text: My daughter and I were at a convention in Mobile and my daughter forgot her contacts at home.  I called BarKing Optical to see if they could provide a trial pair of contacts.  Becky was kind enough to help out and gave us a trial pair.  Her generosity helped us out tremendously.  BarKing is AWESOME!

name: Mandy McDonald
text: We were on vacation at Dauphin Island when my eye became irritated and extremely painful.  I saw this place had good reviews so I called for an appointment. They advised me to bring quarters for the meter and told me where to park.  After the short drive they got me in immediately upon my arrival. Dr King did a thorough exam and explained that my eye was scratched.  She wrote a prescription for an antibiotic and gave me a free pair of shades to wear over my glasses for the rest of my vacation as my eye healed.  Extremely friendly and fast service. The office worker, Becky, gave me her cell number and offered to help with anything else I needed during our stay.  What an awesome experience!  Thank you!!

name: Peyton Lazzari
text: So happy with my experience at BarKing optical. I don’t like going to the eye doctor much, but the women on staff went above and beyond to make me comfortable after just sensing my hesitation on the phone. That level of care is unmatched. I’ve never had such a pleasant experience at a doctor’s office in my life. Looking forward to going back!!

name: Scratch Made Homestead
text: Great experience!!

name: Derek Washington
text: Best eye doctor....

name: Bob Sagget
text: Won't be going back 1st of all they lied and said the brand I used wasn't being made anymore to upsell me to another type. Upselling is fine it's something businesses do but lying about a brand being discontinued to do it isn't. 2nd of all I had an eye exam didn't order contacts at the time when I went back to get some a few months later they wanted to hold my prescription and make me take another exam. You can order contacts from europe without an active prescription if they try this with anyone else just save some money and do that.

name: Stephanie Whitworth
text: the doctor was great but they are real sour about giving you any info for prescriptions. Were in a pandemic and its my info and I should have access to that! I wont be back.

name: bjt 2077
text: Having to wait 3 weeks plus for a box of contacts is ridiculous!

name: Taylor Goodpastor
text: I had the best experience at Marx optical. Sabrina helped me find the perfect pair of tom ford glasses! totally recommend 🤓

name: David Davis
text: Always a wonderful experience!! We always get our new frames earlier than stated! Keep up the great work!!

name: Savannah Hill
text: I was here over Christmas break to get new glasses. The entire staff was very helpful and the doctor took time to answer my questions and explain everything to me. Afterwards the ladies at the front desk were very helpful in helping me to pick out glasses that I was happy with. As an additional plus, they have a beautiful office and a very large selection of available frames.

name: Richard Collier
text: Very unprofessional office staff. The Dr. was trying to help me out and get my glasses before the office closed. The office staff completely ignored him and made me come back for another appointment. I would not visit this office if you expect customer service.

name: Henry Harris
text:
Great place to work great place for service .

Makayla and Jessica 2 wonderful people. I had the best service from this office. Highly recommend Marx Optical Cullman for any of your eye glass needs.

name: William Runyan
text: Had a 1:15 appt. After waiting until 1:45 I was shown to another small room. 15 minutes later one of the pre-exam girls came in. Apparently no one at Marx thought a 45 min wait was unusual. When I questioned the delay, I was told "they were really busy". My time meant nothing to them.  Looks like a successful practice. Too bad customer service is secondary and appointments are a waste of time.

name: Austin
text: I've been to eye doctors in Georgia and Alabama and this place has the best eye doctors. They are the most customer friendly staff I have dealt with. Highly recommend.

name: Olivia Hardin
text: Friendly staff, sadly they didn’t have the frames in stock that I wanted so I’m having to wait a few days for them to order them, it’s been 5 days now. Other than that it’s a great place to go and I recommend everyone to go there

name: mandy barber
text: It had been years since I been to the eye doctor and once I got back get my eyes check the eye doctor and the ones that is with you during the eye exam was so wonderful so I needed glasses first time in my life the ladies who help me pick my glasses out was very helpful concerned how I felt about the glasses was they to small for my face my whole experience was great and very surprising how I felt like I knew these ppl and I didn't first time to use them every person including the eye doctor was so nice down to earth  l  I left happy surprised and happy I chosen marx optical

name: Dj Curtis
text: I absolutely love this place! Great and smiling faces! ❤

name: Xbxnewby Bbbb
text: Sabrina was so great! She made me feel very welcomed! I found the perfect glasses because of her!

name: Joey Turnage
text: Terrific place with a very helpful staff. Deidra & Christi helped save me a bunch of money on my frames and lenses. Only place I’ll go to from now on!

name: sandy baker
text: I was in there a few months back, and will never return due to the fact that I was told my eye pressure was normal, below 20, I was in severe pain, was told to go to Callahan eye hospital, (after I had to pay 40.00)  then was told by Callahan eye hospital my eye pressure was in the 60's, not good, was the cause of bad pain, which then resulted in surgery on both eyes. they need to get somebody that knows how to check eye pressure properly

name: Jamie Braswell
text: I had a medical issue with my eye, and Dr. Sutherland treated it very well.  Dr. Edgerly gave me an eye exam and set me up for some new prescription glasses.  The staff was very friendly and helpful on each visit.  My glasses were ready in just over an hour.  Dawn helped get me set up with my new pair of glasses.  Cullman ' s Marx Optical has a wonderful environment and was a great experience!!

name: Kathy Skinner
text:
Thank you, Megan, for being wholly attentive and taking the time to show me numerous frames; you were unusually patient and your smile, refreshing!
Fondly,
Kathy S.  (“Sparkles)😉

name: Charlie Steeley
text: Great place for eye exam and glasses they always treat you excellent.  Would recommend to anyone.

name: Tony Holcombe
text: Caitlin, was so nice and professional. I highly recommend anyone needing glasses to go and visit Caitlin at cullman Marx optical

name: Joseph Chambers (Joey)
text: We the People of Cullman County Alabama now know that this business is a rip-off... They insure that you have to buy the prescription glasses from them... You won't get no more love here Marx Optical... You won't get no BLT sandwiches either! so here's your Negative 15 rating... Reason being...they won't give you the PD Pupil Distance. Get outta here with that BS.

name: Angela Stadler
text: They are amazing and extremely helpful! I will go out of my way to purchase glasses from them again.

name: ashlie marie
text: Caitlin and Lisa were amazing and super helpful with finding me frames I loved!:)

name: Jessica Veal
text: Deidra and everyone there are amazing people it is truly a God sent place I will forever love to be here!!

name: Jennifer Medley
text: I would like to Thank,  Ms.  Lindsey Albright.  She is a very sweet,  commendable young lady.  She was an excellent  help.  Shr even give me onformation for other family member without insurance. Thank you again will definitely make my eye care visits there.  Marx Optical is hight recommended for your eye care needs. Thank you again .

name: Missy Riddle
text: Had a terrific experience at Marx Optical in Cullman yesterday! They made me feel at home from the front desk to getting my readers. I went there because I knew two people that worked there but basically got to meet the whole gang before I left. They even made sure I got my readers same day! The staff just to mention a few~Lauren, Christi, Hayden, Emily, Susan, Maddie, Jessica, Jen, Deidra, Jen, April and Dr. Southerland made a great impression on me! I will highly recommend to my friends and family!

name: Nicole Moore
text: In the past I have went to Marx in Decatur, this time visited the Cullman Office. My experience was awesome -  Thanks Blaine for all of your knowledge and Dr. Edgerly was the best!

name: Larry Snow
text: The only place we go for eye care. Dr Morton, Meagan, Deidra and Christi are great!

name: Cougar Yarbrough
text: They always have to order my contacts. So i ask for a trial pair they said no.

name: Crimson Angel
text: Everyone here is wonderful. The only place my family goes for their eye exams and glasses.

name: John Wimbs
text: Emily, Caitlin, and Lauren,were awesome. A fun experience.

name: J A Y S O N
text: Great Place To Get Your Eye Exams. A Lot Of Glasses To Choose From. Service Is Good.

name: n8
text: Amazed with the place in Cullman.  Everyone was awesomely helpful with my 'bad-vision' questions.  Will continue my future purchase here!

name: Gerry Orten
text: Lauren was my contact. She did a great job with me.

name: Anita Woodard
text: Love Marx! Very good doctors and staff is excellent!!

name: Charlie Anderson
text: The Dr are good the rest of the staff is Not what the dam

name: bulldog44sos
text:
Details05/05/2017
Went there for an eye exam last year. I purchased some REALLY nice glasses and contacts. Blew about $450 in there. After my exam and purchase, I asked for my eye test results and PD (pupilairy distance) because my employer requires safety glasses and they will not allow me to wear my daily glasses with side shields. Also, since my employer is so strict on the glasses, they provide me with a free pair every year, but my prescription has to be up to date. The ladies behind the desk refused to give me my exam results because it was against their policy. Basically they didn't want me to take my prescription to a competitor and purchase glasses or contacts. I explained my situation and that I had just spent almost 500 on glasses and contacts (and thats additional to insurance paying 150 toward my frames) with them. Didn't matter. I walked to the back and grabbed the optometrist. He gave me my prescription so I could take it to work. That's like a doctor giving you a physical and not giving you your test results because he's afraid you'll use another pharmacy besides the one in his office! That's CRAZY! THOSE ARE MY MEDICAL RECORDS! I'll never set foot into Marx in Cullman again!

name: Donna Ray
text: Thanks to Dawn Pearce for an outstanding visit!

name: Dana Adams
text: Ridiculous! Three hours!

name: Barbecue AnytimeAnyplace
text: My family has been going here for years. They have an enormous selection of frames and the staff has always been friendly and of course so have the Doctors.
